summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2000 DODGE CARAVAN. THE CONTACT STATED THE STRUT TOWER ON THE FRONT DRIVER AND PASSENGER SIDES OF THE VEHICLE WERE COMPLETELY CORRODED AND RUSTED. THE CONTACT WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN FOR BODY WORK. THE CONTACT THEN TOOK THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER AND WAS TOLD THAT THE FAILURE WAS A MANUFACTURING DEFECT AND THAT THE VEHICLE WAS UNSAFE TO DRIVE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 141,000.
